• Turtle simulation with customizable personalities社会学 affecting movement and behavior
  • Interactive grid editing with terrain types (water/grass/sand) and obstacle placement
  • Pathfinding system for turtle navigation around obstacles toward food
    this.path = findPath(this.x, this.y, this.targetFood.x, this.targetFood.y);
    ctx.arc(t.x, t.y, t.p.viewDist, rad - halfFov, rad + halfFov);

A web-based turtle ecosystem simulator where procedural-generated turtles interact with dynamically placed food and obstacles. Users can customize turtle behaviors through personality settings while editing environments with terrain brushes and lily pads. The simulation includes collision detection, pathfinding algorithms, and real-time statistics tracking for observing emergent behaviors.
